verses.verse: They say <S%H559><s%>, If a man <S%H376><s%> put away <S%H7971><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>, and she go <S%H1980><s%> from him <S%H312><s%>, and become another man <S%H376><s%>'s, shall he return unto her again <S%H7725><s%>? shall not that land <S%H776><s%> be greatly <S%H2610><s%> polluted <S%H2610><s%>? but you have played the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> with many <S%H7227><s%> lovers <S%H7453><s%>; yet return again <S%H7725><s%> to me <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Lift up <S%H5375><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> unto the high places <S%H8205><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> where <S%H375><s%> you have not been lain <S%H7693><s%> with <S%H1870><s%>. In the ways have you sat <S%H3427><s%> for them <S%H6163><s%>, as the Arabian in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; and you have polluted <S%H2610><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> with your whoredoms <S%H2184><s%> and with your wickedness <S%H7451><s%>.

Therefore the showers <S%H7241><s%> have been withheld <S%H4513><s%>, and there has been no latter rain <S%H4456><s%>; and you had a whore <S%H2181><s%>'s forehead <S%H4696><s%>, you refused <S%H3985><s%> to be ashamed <S%H3637><s%>.
Will you not from this time cry <S%H7121><s%> unto me <S%H1><s%>, My father, you are the guide <S%H441><s%> of my youth <S%H5271><s%>?

Will he reserve <S%H5201><s%> his anger for ever <S%H5769><s%>? will he keep <S%H8104><s%> it to the end <S%H5331><s%>? Behold <S%H1696><s%>, you have spoken and done <S%H6213><s%> evil things <S%H7451><s%> as you could <S%H3201><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> also unto me in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, Have you seen <S%H7200><s%> that which backsliding <S%H4878><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%>? she is gone up <S%H1980><s%> upon every high <S%H1364><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> every green <S%H7488><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, and there has played the prostitute <S%H2181><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> after <S%H310><s%> she had done <S%H6213><s%> all these things <S%H7725><s%>, Turn you unto me <S%H7725><s%>. But she returned not <S%H901><s%>. And her treacherous sister <S%H269><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> saw it <S%H7200><s%>.

And I saw <S%H7200><s%>, when for all the causes <S%H182><s%> by which backsliding <S%H4878><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> committed adultery <S%H5003><s%> I had put her away <S%H7971><s%>, and given <S%H5414><s%> her a bill <S%H5612><s%> of divorce <S%H3748><s%>; yet her treacherous <S%H898><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H3212><s%>, but went and played the prostitute also <S%H2181><s%>.

And it came to pass through the lightness <S%H6963><s%> of her whoredom <S%H2184><s%>, that she defiled <S%H2610><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and committed adultery <S%H5003><s%> with stones <S%H68><s%> and with stocks <S%H6086><s%>.

And yet for all this her treacherous <S%H901><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> has not turned <S%H7725><s%> unto me with her whole heart <S%H3820><s%>, but feignedly <S%H8267><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H4878><s%>, The backsliding Israel <S%H3478><s%> has justified <S%H6663><s%> herself <S%H5315><s%> more than treacherous <S%H898><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

Go <S%H1980><s%> and proclaim <S%H7121><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Return <S%H7725><s%>, you backsliding <S%H4878><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and I will not cause my anger <S%H6440><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> upon you <S%H2623><s%>: for I am merciful, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and I will not keep <S%H5201><s%> anger for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Only acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> your iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, that you have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and have scattered <S%H6340><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%> to the strangers <S%H2114><s%> under every green <S%H7488><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, and you have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Turn <S%H7725><s%>, O backsliding <S%H7726><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; for I am married <S%H1166><s%> unto you <S%H3947><s%>: and I will take you one <S%H259><s%> of a city <S%H5892><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> of a family <S%H4940><s%>, and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you to Zion <S%H6726><s%>:
And I will give <S%H5414><s%> you pastors <S%H7462><s%> according to my heart <S%H3820><s%>, which shall feed <S%H7462><s%> you with knowledge <S%H1844><s%> and understanding <S%H7919><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H7235><s%>, when you be multiplied and increased <S%H6509><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, in those days <S%H3117><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, they shall say <S%H559><s%> no more <S%H727><s%>, The ark of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: neither shall it come <S%H5927><s%> to mind <S%H3820><s%>: neither shall they remember <S%H2142><s%> it <S%H6485><s%>; neither shall they visit it <S%H6213><s%>; neither shall that be made any more.

At that time <S%H6256><s%> they shall call <S%H7121><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and all the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be gathered <S%H6960><s%> unto it <S%H8034><s%>, to the name of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: neither shall they walk <S%H3212><s%> any more after <S%H310><s%> the imagination <S%H8307><s%> of their evil <S%H7451><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>.

In those days <S%H3117><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall walk <S%H3212><s%> with the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and they shall come <S%H935><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> that I have given for a inheritance <S%H5157><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

But I said <S%H559><s%>, How shall I put <S%H7896><s%> you among the sons <S%H1121><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> you a pleasant <S%H2532><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, a good <S%H6643><s%> heritage <S%H5159><s%> of the hosts <S%H6635><s%> of nations <S%H1471><s%>? and I said <S%H559><s%>, You shall call <S%H7121><s%> me <S%H1><s%>, My father; and shall not turn away <S%H7725><s%> from me <S%H310><s%>.

Surely <S%H403><s%> as a wife <S%H802><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%> departs from her husband <S%H7453><s%>, so have you dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> with me <S%H1004><s%>, O house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

A voice <S%H6963><s%> was heard <S%H8085><s%> upon the high places <S%H8205><s%>, weeping <S%H1065><s%> and supplications <S%H8469><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: for they have perverted <S%H5753><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%>, and they have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>.

Return <S%H7725><s%>, you backsliding <S%H7726><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, and I will heal <S%H7495><s%> your backslidings <S%H4878><s%>. Behold <S%H857><s%>, we come unto you <S%H3068><s%>; for you are the Lord our God <S%H430><s%>.

Truly <S%H403><s%> in vain <S%H8267><s%> is salvation hoped for from the hills <S%H1389><s%>, and from the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of mountains <S%H2022><s%>: truly <S%H403><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is the salvation <S%H8668><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For shame <S%H1322><s%> has devoured <S%H398><s%> the labor <S%H3018><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%> from our youth <S%H5271><s%>; their flocks <S%H6629><s%> and their herds <S%H1241><s%>, their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

We lie down <S%H7901><s%> in our shame <S%H1322><s%>, and our confusion <S%H3639><s%> covers <S%H3680><s%> us <S%H2398><s%>: for we have sinned against the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, we and our fathers <S%H1><s%>, from our youth <S%H5271><s%> even unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, and have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.
